check.name: VariableDeclarationUsageDistance
check.description: Checks the distance between declaration of variable and its first usage. Note : Any additional variables declared or initialized between the declaration and the first usage of the said variable are not counted when calculating the distance.

property.name: allowedDistance
property.description: Specify distance between declaration of variable and its first usage. Values should be greater than 0.

property.name: ignoreFinal
property.description: Allow to ignore variables with a 'final' modifier.

property.name: ignoreVariablePattern
property.description: Define RegExp to ignore distance calculation for variables listed in this pattern.

property.name: validateBetweenScopes
property.description: Allow to calculate the distance between declaration of variable and its first usage in the different scopes.
